mapper.select: SELECT A.PROJECT_CODE , A.PROJECT_TITLE , A.PROJECT_START_DATE , A.PROJECT_END_DATE , A.PROJECT_PROGRESS , A.PROJECT_BODY , A.PROJECT_VERSION , A.PROJECT_DELETE_STATUS , A.PROJECT_WRITER FROM TBL_PROJECT A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON(A.PROJECT_WRITER = B.MEMBER_NAME) JOIN TBL_PROJECT_MEMBERS C ON(A.PROJECT_CODE = C.PROJECT_CODE) WHERE C.MEMBER_NO = #{ no } AND A.PROJECT_DELETE_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY PROJECT_CODE DESC

SELECT A.PROJECT_CODE , A.MEMBER_NO , A.PROJECT_PARTICIPATION_YN , B.MEMBER_NAME , C.ROLE_NAME FROM TBL_PROJECT_MEMBERS A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON(A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TBL_ROLE C ON(A.PROJECT_CODE = C.PROJECT_CODE) WHERE A.PROJECT_CODE = #{ code } AND B.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PROJECT A ( A.PROJECT_CODE , A.PROJECT_TITLE , A.PROJECT_START_DATE , A.PROJECT_END_DATE , A.PROJECT_PROGRESS , A.PROJECT_BODY , A.PROJECT_VERSION , A.PROJECT_DELETE_STATUS , A.PROJECT_WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_PROJECT_NO.NEXTVAL , #{ title } , #{ startDate } , #{ endDate } , '미진행' , #{ body } , 1 , 'N' , #{ writer } )
INSERT INTO TBL_PROJECT_MEMBERS A ( A.PROJECT_CODE , A.MEMBER_NO , A.PROJECT_PARTICIPATION_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_PROJECT_NO.CURRVAL , #{ no } , 'Y' )
INSERT INTO TBL_ROLE A ( A.ROLE_CODE , A.ROLE_NAME , A.MEMBER_NO , A.PROJECT_CODE ) VALUES ( SEQ_ROLE_CODE.NEXTVAL , 'PM' , #{ no } , SEQ_PROJECT_NO.CURRVAL )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_PROJECT A SET A.PROJECT_DELETE_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE A.PROJECT_CODE = #{ code }
